bibl.title: Dispatch from Robert S Newton to the Asisstant Secretary of State
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener: United States Consulate St Paul de Loanda 18 February 1881
div1.p: Sir I have the honor to forward to the Department herewith Extract Translation of the Royal Decree (published in the Loanda "Bolstin Official") of Tonnage dues Cerable on Foreign & National Vessels either Ocean going or Coasting.
I have the honor to be, Sir, Your obedient Servant Rob S Newton U.S. Vice Consul
To the Assistant Secretary of State Washington D.C.
